column4: guys. i am cuztomizing the desktop. can i use gtk & emeral themes are the same time? or are those two mutually exclusive? because i see one theme pack that has a gtk and an emerald theme, don't know what to do
compiz can use 1 of the 3 window decorators at the same time.. So yes.. those 2 are exclusive.
so to install the full theme, I need to install both of those correct?
like adam7 said. a 'gnome' theme has parts.. the window decorations and the widgits in the window. :)
